testcase.name: test_superadmin_billing_overview

failure.message: AssertionError: Missing summary object assert 'summary' in {'condominiums': [{'active_users': 4, 'billing_status': 'active', 'condominium_id': 'dc708ced-42b7-4365-96ad-500cf2b925a1', 'condominium_name': 'Bariloche', ...}, {'active_users': 22, 'billing_status': 'active', 'condominium_id': '46b9d344-a735-443a-8c9c-0e3d69c07824', 'condominium_name': 'Residencial Las Palmas', ...}], 'totals': {'total_active_users': 26, 'total_condominiums': 2, 'total_monthly_revenue': 60.0, 'total_paid_seats': 60}}

testcase.failure: backend/tests/test_saas_billing.py:126: in test_superadmin_billing_overview assert "summary" in data, "Missing summary object" E AssertionError: Missing summary object E assert 'summary' in {'condominiums': [{'active_users': 4, 'billing_status': 'active', 'condominium_id': 'dc708ced-42b7-4365-96ad-500cf2b925a1', 'condominium_name': 'Bariloche', ...}, {'active_users': 22, 'billing_status': 'active', 'condominium_id': '46b9d344-a735-443a-8c9c-0e3d69c07824', 'condominium_name': 'Residencial Las Palmas', ...}], 'totals': {'total_active_users': 26, 'total_condominiums': 2, 'total_monthly_revenue': 60.0, 'total_paid_seats': 60}}
